title: The Besties 66 - Rise of the Sun
description:
What's that sound? Well I'll be! It's the dulcet tones of Mr. David Tach. Yes, this week Dave "Sweet Sweet Butter Voice" Tach fills in for Justin "Hoops" McElroy. We discuss the rising of a triad, the setting of a sun, the returning of a shadow and the escaping of a zero. Won't you join us on this audio expedition?

4:05 - The best new old game (Rise of the Triad)
13:20 - The best old new game (Shadowrun Returns)
21:20 - Halftime!
32:10 - The best PC game that could be a mobile game (Race the Sun)
36:50 - The best game that was on PS+ but isn't anymore (Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward)
43:00 - The winner is...

Theme song by Ian Dorsch
Get the show:

Download MP3"
Subscribe to the podcast (RSS)
Subscribe on iTunes
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
